content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started with your electrical service, could you please provide your name?
I just want someone to come fix my lights, no need for my name or anything.
I understand the urgency to get your lights fixed quickly. Could you please share your address so we can verify our service availability and schedule the appointment?
Why do you need my address? Just send someone over. I'm not giving out personal info.
To provide effective service and confirm we can reach you, we need an address. Unfortunately, without it, we can't proceed. Please share your address or let me know if I can assist in another way.
Forget it. If you can't help without my info, I'll call someone else.
reason: Customer refused to provide necessary information for service.
